channel.title: - Articles
channel.description: I am a German trainee lawyer, software engineer, and data scientist.

item.title: How to train a fastai model and run it in the browser
item.description: This post covers an end-to-end example project of training a resnet model with fastai and PyTorch, exporting it to ONNX and running it in the browser inside a React.js app.

item.title: Understanding and Building a GraphQL Server
item.description: If you are trying to build a GraphQL server today, you donâ€™t have much choice: You pretty much have to use the reference implementation graphql-js. The problem is, though, that there is almost no documentation for it, yet.
